Package com.inrupt.client.accessgrant

Class AccessGrantClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrupt.client.accessgrant.AccessGrantClient
  • public class AccessGrantClient
extends Object
    A client for interacting with and managing Access Grant Resources.

    This client will require a suitable Session object, typically an OpenID-based session: 

    
   URI SOLID_ACCESS_GRANT = URI.create("http://www.w3.org/ns/solid/vc#SolidAccessGrant");
   URI issuer = URI.create("https://issuer.example");
   Session openid = OpenIdSession.ofIdToken(idToken);

   AccessGrantClient client = new AccessGrantClient(issuer).session(session);

   URI resource = URI.create("https://storage.example/data/resource");
   client.query(SOLID_ACCESS_GRANT, null, resource, null)
       .thenApply(grants -> AccessGrantSession.ofAccessGrant(openid, grants.toArray(new AccessGrant[0])))
       .thenApply(session -> SolidClient.getClient().session(session))
       .thenAccept(cl -> {
            // Do something with the Access Grant-scoped client
       });

      • issue

        public CompletionStage<AccessGrant> issue​(URI type,
                                          URI agent,
                                          Set<URI> resources,
                                          Set<String> modes,
                                          Set<String> purposes,
                                          Instant expiration)
        Issue an access grant or request.
        Parameters:
        type - the credential type
        agent - the receiving agent for this credential
        resources - the resources to which this credential applies
        modes - the access modes for this credential
        purposes - the purposes of this credential
        expiration - the expiration time of this credential
        Returns:
        the next stage of completion containing the resulting credential

      • query

        public CompletionStage<List<AccessGrant>> query​(URI type,
                                                URI agent,
                                                URI resource,
                                                String mode)
        Perform an Access Grant query.

        The type parameter must be an absolute URI. For Access Requests, the URI is http://www.w3.org/ns/solid/vc#SolidAccessRequest. For Access Grants, the URI is http://www.w3.org/ns/solid/vc#SolidAccessGrant. Other URIs may be defined in the future.

        Parameters:
        type - the Access Grant type
        agent - the agent identifier, may be null
        resource - the resource identifier, may be null
        mode - the access mode, may be null
        Returns:
        the next stage of completion, including the matched Access Grants
